channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Find My Mobile
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Find My Mobile

item.title: CVE-2023-42571|2024-08-02T19:23:39.684Z -- samsung%20mobile -- find%20my%20mobile
item.description: Abuse of remote unlock in Find My Mobile prior to version 7.3.13.4 allows physical attacker to unlock the device remotely by resetting the Samsung Account password with SMS verification when user lost the device.
